text: Erwin Nypels (1 August 1933 - 8 December 2024) was a Dutch politician. He was born in Bloemendaal, North Holland. He was the Minister of Housing and Spatial Planning in 1982. Nypels was a member of Democrats 66.Parlement.com Nypels died in Rijswijk, Netherlands on 8 December 2024, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Holland
title: Erwin Nypels
